text: Random bus stop in the middle of orchard road, right opposite Scape and Orchard Cineleisure. I say it's random because there's no shelter nor anything connected to this bus stop, which makes it quite a pain to get to if you're stranded and need to get somewhere. Beyond that, it's also that confusing bus stop where buses split between the road behind Ngee Ann City / Wisma Atria, and the main road. Vs the previous stop at Somerset. So you'll need to be mindful of these things.
Bus stop had a screen to track bus locations, has lots of busses
Nice place where to hang out OFw like me
